alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 10:57AM CDT until November 05 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Champaign, Vermilion, Douglas, Coles and Edgar Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 1 PM CDT this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Showers and thunderstorms will accompany the windy conditions, and may locally enhance winds.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
